Preference.name: ENABLE_FOOT_CONTACT_PROTECTION
Preference.description: If true the walk task will be killed or prevented from launching if no foot contact(footContact)

Preference.name: ENABLE_STIFFNESS_PROTECTION
Preference.description: If true the walk task will be killed or prevented from launching if one joint of the legs has a Stiffness equal or less than 0.6

Preference.name: DIAGNOSTIC_IS_OK
Preference.description: If true the diagnostic of the robot is ok or have never been called
